post:
![](http://terafire.net/clients/templates/slick-host-v3-4/images/logo.png)

We are located in the Los Angeles Quadranet datacenter (not via ColoCrossing), with a 1Gbit uplink, and offer affordable, aggressive, KVM and OpenVZ plans.  

Our nodes run Debian natively, and we do not use the SolusVM plug-n-play that most other companies do.  
We have a wide variety of operating systems including many flavors of Linux, FreeBSD, Windows (BYOL), and PBX systems.  

We are fully IPv6 native and offer server management packages as optional add-ons to all our VPS servers.  

All orders are automatically provisioned after payment.

15 Order Special

First fifteen orders can use this coupon code with this plan:

**OpenVZ Special**  
CPU: 3 Cores   
RAM: 2,5GB   
Swap: 2.5GB   
RAID HDD: 60GB   
Transfer: 2.5TB   
IPs: 2   
Price: $7.00/month with coupon: **TERAFIRESCRAZY**   
**First 15 orders only!**  
[Order Link ](https://terafire.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=16)  

**KVM Special**  
KVM1024   
1 CPU Core   
1 GB RAM   
25 GB RAID HDD   
1 TB Bandwidth   
1 IP Address   
$6.50/mo with coupon code: **ILOVEADEAL50**  
[Order Link ](https://terafire.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=5)  


You all know our deal. Any questions don't be afraid to submit a pre-sales ticket.
